summary: This document is an electronic communication from the FBI requesting the transfer of a case involving Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell due to an agent's transfer to another squad. It outlines the need for reassignment of the case to ensure continuity in the investigation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary subject of the investigation related to child prostitution.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is mentioned as a co-accused in the case involving child prostitution.

connections.description: Both individuals are implicated in the same case involving child prostitution.
The Special Agent is investigating Jeffrey Epstein as part of the case.

keyFacts: The document is a request for the transfer of a case involving Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.
The request is due to the transfer of a Special Agent to another squad.
The case is related to allegations of child prostitution.
